item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Digital gardens people maintain outside the "Big Tech" walled gardens (131 points | 30 comments)
2. UK ICO response to Google's policy change on device fingerprinting (36 points | 18 comments)
3. iTerm2 critical security release (539 points | 314 comments)
4. Kuvasz-streamer: open-source CDC for Postgres for low latency replication (51 points | 2 comments)
5. Zildjian, a 400-year-old cymbal-making company in Massachusetts (336 points | 163 comments)
6. JPL Horizons on-line solar system data and ephemeris computation service (23 points | 4 comments)
7. Advent of Code 2024 in pure SQL (328 points | 76 comments)
8. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 4 (129 points | 16 comments)
9. Why was there a wall near runway at S Korea plane crash airport? (10 points | 18 comments)
10. Ask HN: How to learn marketing and sales as a solo entrepreneur? (160 points | 45 comments)
11. TinyStories: How Small Can Language Models Be and Still Speak Coherent English? (2023) (169 points | 78 comments)
12. Shmøergh Hog – The making of a simple analog synth (93 points | 2 comments)
13. Be a property owner and not a renter on the internet (234 points | 140 comments)
14. The Alder Lake SHLX Anomaly (131 points | 40 comments)
15. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2025) (255 points | 211 comments)
16. Multispectral imaging through scattering media and around corners (14 points | discuss)
17. DOOM CAPTCHA (1192 points | 258 comments)
18. Diagnosing an Unusual WiFi Issue (2020) (209 points | 73 comments)
19. XiangShan – open-source high performance RISC-V processor (197 points | 62 comments)
20. Postgres UUIDv7 and per-back end monotonicity (190 points | 93 comments)
21. Rules for writing software tutorials (198 points | 39 comments)
22. I am rich and have no idea what to do (582 points | 958 comments)
23. uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension (759 points | 346 comments)
24. Building a Knowledge System That Enhances Rather Than Replaces Thought (97 points | 25 comments)
25. What Is miniKanren? (206 points | 110 comments)
26. Laser mapping reveals oldest Amazonian cities, built 2500 years ago (4 points | discuss)
27. U.S. appeals court strikes down FCC's net neutrality rules (227 points | 194 comments)
28. Mars Exploration: How the CIA's Project Stargate Went to Mars [pdf] (13 points | 4 comments)
29. The Anthrobots: a new living entity with much to teach us (42 points | 7 comments)
30. UpCodes (YC S17) is hiring remote recruiters to help make buildings cheaper ( | hide)
